Posts.Content: Originally Posted by kadams7 Hello Everyone! Martino Cartier is holding a breast cancer event in NYC on October 15th and 16th in the Grand Ballroom at the Waldorf Astroia. We are looking for women with little to no hair to model elborate wigs designed by Martino, infront of 1000 Salon owners from across the country. What Martino is doing is holding this event to ask salons acrosss the country to never charge women for hair replacement services. If you or anyone you know might be interested please contact us asap! Thank you and I look forward to hearing from you!
Posts.Title: NYC Breast Cancer Movement

Posts.Content: Hello Everyone! Martino Cartier is holding a breast cancer event in NYC on October 15th and 16th in the Grand Ballroom at the Waldorf Astroia. We are looking for women with little to no hair to model elborate wigs designed by Martino, infront of 1000 Salon owners from across the country. What Martino is doing is holding this event to ask salons acrosss the country to never charge women for hair replacement services. If you or anyone you know might be interested please contact us asap! Thank you and I look forward to hearing from you!
Posts.Title: NYC Breast Cancer Movement
